SEARCH

BigDoors 1 API

Packages
Package
Description
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.annotations
This package contains annotations used by this project.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api
This package contains various APIs used throughout the project, including definitions for animated blocks, colors, debugging, factories, glowing block spawners, the platform interface, and more.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.animatedblock
This package contains various interfaces and classes used to define animated blocks.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.debugging
This package contains classes and interfaces used for debugging.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.factories
This package contains various factories for creating objects used in the project.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.restartable
Contains classes and interfaces used to easily restart objects.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.audio
This package contains the audio system used in this project, including audio animation hooks, audio set configurations, audio descriptions, and audio players.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.commands
This package contains command definitions and command factories used by this project, as well as various base command classes and interfaces.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.data.cache
This package contains classes that implement various caching mechanisms.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.data.cache.timed
This package contains classes that implement timed cache mechanisms.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.data.graph
This package contains all the classes related to graph-based storage such as the DirectedAcyclicGraph (DAG).
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.events
Contains interfaces and classes for handling events related to BigDoors structures.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.extensions
Contains classes for loading structure types from external sources.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.localization
Contains classes for localizing text in the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.managers
This package contains managers that manage different certain aspects of the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.moveblocks
This package contains the core logic for animating structures..
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.storage
This package contains storage-related classes, including storage interfaces, SQLite database storage classes, and more.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.storage.sqlite
Contains the storage implementation for SQLite.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.structures
This package contains classes that define, manipulate, and manage structures.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.structures.structurearchetypes
Contains interfaces for structures that define certain archetypes of structures.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.text
This package contains text-related utilities used for communication with users.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.tooluser
Contains the classes for the tool users system.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.tooluser.creator
The creator package contains classes that are responsible for creating structures.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.tooluser.stepexecutor
Contains the StepExecutor class and its subclasses.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.util
This package contains utility classes and interfaces that are used throughout the project.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.util.delayedinput
This package contains classes and interfaces related to handling and processing delayed input requests.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.util.functional
This package contains classes related to functional programming, such as versions of Function, Supplier, and BiFunction that throw checked exceptions.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.util.structureretriever
This package contains classes and interfaces related to retrieving structures from the database.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.util.vector
This package contains classes related to vectors, including various types of 2D and 3D vectors, as well as utilities for working with these vectors.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core
The BigDoors Spigot core module contains classes and interfaces specific to the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.comands
This package contains classes responsible for handling commands.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.compatiblity
This package contains classes responsible for providing compatibility with various third-party plugins.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.config
This package contains classes responsible for handling the configuration files used by the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.events
This package contains implementations for all event-related classes for the BigDoors plugin for the Spigot platform as well as utilities to call events.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.exceptions
This package contains custom exception classes for the BigDoors plugin for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.gui
This package contains all GUI-related classes for the BigDoors plugin for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.implementations
This package contains classes that provide implementations for various interfaces in the core module for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.listeners
This package contains all classes for event listeners for various types of events for the BigDoors plugin for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.logging
This package contains all classes related to logging in BigDoors for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.managers
Contains classes that manage various aspects of the plugin specifically for the Spigot platform, such as redstone management and vault economy integration.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util
Provides utility classes that depend on the Spigot API and can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util.api
Contains various APIs used by BigDoorsSpigot that need to be implemented by a sub-platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util.implementations
Provides implementations of BigDoors core interfaces that can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.v1_19_R2
Contains implementations of all version-specific code for the Spigot v1_19_R2 platform.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.structures.bigdoor
This package contains all the data for the big door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.structures.clock
This package contains all the data for the clock structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.structures.drawbridge
This package contains all the data for the drawbridge structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.structures.flag
This package contains all the data for the flag structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.structures.garagedoor
This package contains all the data for the garage door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.structures.portcullis
This package contains all the data for the portcullis structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.structures.revolvingdoor
This package contains all the data for the revolving door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.structures.slidingdoor
This package contains all the data for the sliding door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.structures.windmill
This package contains all the data for the windmill structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.testing
This package contains a set of utility classes and methods that are only used for the unit and integration tests in the other modules.
nl.pim16aap2.testing.logging
This package contains utility classes that can be used to interact with the logging framework during unit tests.
nl.pim16aap2.util
The package contains general-purpose utilities that are not directly related to the BigDoors project.
nl.pim16aap2.util.logging
This package contains a set of utilities the for logging framework.
nl.pim16aap2.util.reflection
This package contains a set of tools that makes reflection lookups easier.
